attributes.action: Show the symbol of the political party in power on any parking ticket issued.
attributes.background: The level of fines issued in any area is a decision made by elected officials. It is a budgetary decision made at a local level and the responsibility for the cost and issuing of such fines should be transparent. This should also apply to contractors working for or on land owned by the council.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In any case, decisions about parking tickets would be the responsibility of the local council or private company operating the car park and not the UK Government or Parliament.
